help-file.title: GSAY
help-file.content:
Syntax: gsay <message>
This is a "conference" mode of communication used by grouped players. Only the members of your group will hear your communication and it also works when group members are not in the same room.
Example: gsay Let's kill this wraith.
Note: Gsay may possibly be eavesdropped on by classes with the skill "listen".
